creator: laker8@cs.man.ac.uk
text:
I have had the following error return while viewing the root of my project 
folder, e.g. "http://host/project/". It initially occurs at a random time after 
launching the server, usually after many successful (correctly redirected) 
viewings of "index.jsp" at that location. After the first time, it repeatedly 
fails for all subsequent attempts unless the full URL 
"http://host/project/index.jsp" is used. A restart of the server temporarily 
corrects the issue. My project entry in "server.xml" is the same as for the 
"examples" with the obvious change of the project name.


Error: 500
Location: /project/
Internal Servlet Error:

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Can't happen - classname is null, who added 
this ?
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.loadServlet
(ServletWrapper.java:261)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.init(ServletWrapper.java:289)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.Handler.service(Handler.java:254)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ServletWrapper.service
(ServletWrapper.java:372)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.handleStatus
(ContextManager.java:1058)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.internalService
(ContextManager.java:775)
	at org.apache.tomcat.core.ContextManager.service
(ContextManager.java:743)
	at 
org.apache.tomcat.service.http.HttpConnectionHandler.processConnection
(HttpConnectionHandler.java:213)
	at org.apache.tomcat.service.TcpWorkerThread.runIt
(PoolTcpEndpoint.java:416)
	at org.apache.tomcat.util.ThreadPool$ControlRunnable.run
(ThreadPool.java:501)
	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:484)

creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
text: Resolved in 3.3 ( it's duplicate of some other bug, but don't remember the ID ).
Better resolve as duplicate than fixed
creator: nacho@apache.org
nacho@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 296 ***
